messages.message: Hello Italy! I chose you as the first country to message to try to figure out the truth/lie setup
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Hello Italy! I chose you as the first country to message to try to figure out the truth/lie setup'.

messages.message:
All right I see how it works now :).
Anyways, I'm sure we both know how Italy can be at the start of the game, having trouble expanding quickly, but right on the border with Trieste making Austria a tempting target
messages.input:
My response to ITALY:'All right I see how it works now :).
Anyways, I'm sure we both know how Italy can be at the start of the game, having trouble expanding quickly, but right on the border with Trieste making Austria a tempting target'.

messages.message: I firmly believe that Italy/Austria is one of the most fruitful alliances possible in the game. If we work together early, we can be dominant against Turkey, giving you complete naval supramacy over the Mediterranean and highly favoring us over R/T in a fight in the Balkans.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I firmly believe that Italy/Austria is one of the most fruitful alliances possible in the game. If we work together early, we can be dominant against Turkey, giving you complete naval supramacy over the Mediterranean and highly favoring us over R/T in a fight in the Balkans.'.

messages.message: I happily await your response :)
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I happily await your response :)'.

messages.message: Hi Austria! An alliance between us sounds good. Look forward to working with you
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Hi Austria! An alliance between us sounds good. Look forward to working with you'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's positive response to Austria's proposal for an alliance suggests a willingness to collaborate and indicates a good basis for future diplomatic interactions. This response fosters trust and sets a positive tone for cooperation between the two countries.

messages.message: Sounds good! Do you mind letting me know your plans for Venice this turn? A move to piedmont would give me great peace of mind
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Sounds good! Do you mind letting me know your plans for Venice this turn? A move to piedmont would give me great peace of mind'.

messages.message: I'll probably keep the army in Venice for the time being, perhaps we could have Tyr as a DMZ between us?
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'I'll probably keep the army in Venice for the time being, perhaps we could have Tyr as a DMZ between us?'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's proposal for a demilitarized zone (DMZ) in Tyrolia indicates a diplomatic effort to establish clear boundaries and maintain a peaceful coexistence with Austria, showing a willingness to engage in cooperative agreements and promote stability in the region. This response demonstrates a diplomatic and conciliatory approach to fostering positive relations with Austria.

messages.message: All right understood. Hope we can work together!
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'All right understood. Hope we can work together!'.

messages.message: I look forward to it
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'I look forward to it'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's simple and positive affirmation of looking forward to working together exhibits a cooperative and amicable attitude, indicating a genuine interest in maintaining a productive relationship with Austria. This response reinforces the notion of a willingness to collaborate and suggests a positive dynamic between the two countries.

messages.message: Just for full transparency, I'm going to be going to Tyr this turn, not as a move against you though
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Just for full transparency, I'm going to be going to Tyr this turn, not as a move against you though'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's transparent communication about their intention to move to Tyrolia, clarifying that it is not directed against Austria, demonstrates a proactive effort to maintain trust and honesty in the diplomatic exchange. This openness fosters a positive atmosphere for continued cooperation between Italy and Austria.

messages.message: Hmm, I'm not thrilled about that. What are you doing with the unit in Rome?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Hmm, I'm not thrilled about that. What are you doing with the unit in Rome?'.

messages.message: Heading up to Piedmont
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Heading up to Piedmont'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's decision to move the unit from Rome to Piedmont aligns with their previous communication regarding their intentions, showing consistency in their actions and fostering trust in their transparency and cooperation with Austria. This response indicates a clear and direct approach, contributing to a more stable diplomatic relationship between the two countries.

messages.message: Okay, so you plan to use tyrolia against Munich then?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Okay, so you plan to use tyrolia against Munich then?'.

messages.message: Not necessarily against them, just to have a unit on the border
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Not necessarily against them, just to have a unit on the border'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's clarification that the move to Tyrolia is not specifically aimed at Munich but rather to position a unit on the border indicates a defensive rather than offensive strategy, fostering a sense of transparency and honesty in the communication. This response suggests a willingness to clarify intentions and maintain a cooperative approach with Austria.

messages.message: Frankly, I'm not very interested in letting you do that. I'd prefer Venice hold.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Frankly, I'm not very interested in letting you do that. I'd prefer Venice hold.'.

messages.message: I'm sure you would
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'I'm sure you would'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's concise response reflects an understanding of Austria's preference for Venice to hold and indicates a willingness to acknowledge and accept Austria's stance on the matter. This reply maintains a level of diplomacy and indicates a respectful approach to Austrian concerns.

messages.message: Ok. I should let you know then that I will be moving Trieste->Venice. Nothing personal, of course. I just need to make sure my border is safe.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Ok. I should let you know then that I will be moving Trieste->Venice. Nothing personal, of course. I just need to make sure my border is safe.'.

messages.message:
It was mainly to keep Germany on edge, you'd have though I wouldn't have told you as you'd have obviously moved on Venice

I will remain in Venice for now though
messages.input:
Message from ITALY:'It was mainly to keep Germany on edge, you'd have though I wouldn't have told you as you'd have obviously moved on Venice

I will remain in Venice for now though'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's explanation for the move from Trieste to Venice, emphasizing its defensive nature to keep Germany on edge rather than as a direct threat to Austria, demonstrates a strategic approach aimed at managing relationships with multiple neighbors. This response seeks to clarify Italy's intentions and aims to maintain open communication with Austria.

messages.message: Well in my opinion Germany is one of our strongest possible mutual allies in the north, so I'd prefer if you didn't move on him either. I know I'm being difficult, and I apologize, but as Austria at this point in the game I have to try to stay as guarded as possible.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Well in my opinion Germany is one of our strongest possible mutual allies in the north, so I'd prefer if you didn't move on him either. I know I'm being difficult, and I apologize, but as Austria at this point in the game I have to try to stay as guarded as possible.'.

messages.message: Since Germany seems to be afk, I'd be open to you moving on Tyrolia so we can work together to consolidate Munich and Berlin before the northern powers get there.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'Since Germany seems to be afk, I'd be open to you moving on Tyrolia so we can work together to consolidate Munich and Berlin before the northern powers get there.'.

messages.message: Okay, I'll be moving to Tyr this turn
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Okay, I'll be moving to Tyr this turn'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's decision to move to Tyrolia indicates a willingness to cooperate with Austria's proposal to consolidate Munich and Berlin, suggesting an alignment of strategies and a commitment to joint success. This move fosters a positive step towards collaboration and working together for mutual benefit.
